17105.「ここが ウワサの幽霊部屋 桜の間……。:
This is the Chamber of Cherry Blossoms...
The room that's rumored to be haunted.

17106.「見たところ ふつうの部屋ですね。\n もうちょっと おどろおどろしい部屋を\n:
But it's just an ordinary room... I was
imagining something a bit more scary. I'm
a bit disappointed, to say the least.

17129.「封印が 道を ふさいじゃってる。 \n それも なんて強いチカラ……。:
This seal is blocking the way.
It's really strong...

17130.「こんなに強い封印…… あたしには\n とても解けないです。先に進むのは\n あ:
What a strong seal... I can't break it.
I guess we have no choice but to give up
and go back...

17131.「やはり 私の読みに\n まちがいは なかったようだ。: It appears what I read was right after all...

17132.「すっ すごい！ 封印が 消えちゃった。\n でも先生…… いいんですか？:
W-wow! The seal's gone!
But, Professor...are you sure?

17134.「すっげー。ここが 神代の間なのかな。\n うへへ オイラ 足跡つけとこ。:
Whoa... I wonder if this is the Hall of Old?
Heh, heh... Guess I'll leave some of my
footprints here!

17135.「どうしたってんだよ ハジカ先生～。\n いったい なにやってんだ？:
What's goin' on, teach? What the heck are you
doing?

17136.「ああ…… すまない。そういえば\n 君たちに 借りていたものが あるんだ。\n:
Oh...sorry. That reminds me...I borrowed
something from you all. Here, you can have
it back.

17138.「オイラが拾った ラブレター！！\n な なんで……？: The love letter! But why did you...?

17139.「ハジカ先生……\n ラブレターを 盗んだのは\n あなただったんですね。: So it was you who took the love letter...

17143.「い 行っちゃった……。\n 今のは いったい……。:
It's-it's gone...
Just what was that thing?

17146.「でた～～～～～～！！\n あんちゃーん！ 女の幽霊だよ！！: It's HERE!! Look, bro! It's the ghost!!

17147.「ヒメア様！！ どうして ここに！？: Lady Himea! What are you doing here?!

17149.「ハジカ…… 封印を解いたのは\n そなただな？ 師とも あろうものが\n どう:
Hajika...so you are the one who broke the
seal, I presume? As a teacher, no less...
Care to explain why you did this?

17150.「ヒメア様の ご登場とは 参りましたね。\n あなたのことです。お察しでしょうか:
I'm impressed to see you here, Lady Himea. Knowing you, I'm sure you already know why I'm here, so I suppose I should just come
clean.

17151.「私は あなたが ５００年前に使ったという\n 不老の禁術を 目当てに\n この:
I came here to Tsuskuru Village in search of
the forbidden art of immortality you used
500 years ago.

17152.「私は これまでの人生を\n すべて 学問に 捧げてきました。\n そして 悟っ:
I have devoted my entire life to study and
learning. And that's when I realized...

17153.「真理に たどりつくには\n 人の一生は あまりにも短いと……。:
Man's life is simply too short to reach the
truth...

17154.「……死とは 残酷なものです。\n いかなる賢者の英知も 命が尽きれば\n 一瞬:
Death is a cruel mistress. Even the wisdom of
the smartest sage can be lost in but a mere
moment when their life ends.

17155.「それで この神代の間へ\n 不老の禁術の書を 探しにきたというのか。:
So that is why you came hereーin search of
the forbidden book?

17156.「おそれを知らぬ 愚か者め。\n 不老の禁術は 書に残してなどおらぬ。:
You fearlessly ignorant fool... I did not
leave the forbidden art of immortality
inside the pages of a book.

17157.「愚か者……？ それは あなただ ヒメア。\n 不老の禁術が どれだけ人々に\n:
Fool...? The only fool here is you, Himea.
Don't you know the possibilities that art can
bring to us mortals?

17158.「そのような すばらしい術を知りながら\n なぜ 世のために 使おうとしない？:
If you're so knowledgeable about such an
amazing art, then why not use it for the good
of the world?

17159.「あの禁術は そなたの思っているような \n 万能の術ではない。禁術のチカラを\:
That art is not the all-powerful answer you
may think it is. There exist only few people
who are able to accept its power.

17160.「多くの者は 禁術のチカラに たえきれず\n 人としての心と身体を失い 死ぬこと:
Most people cannot withstand its power. They lose both their sanity and their bodies, and are unable to dieーdoomed to wander for
eternity.

17161.「そう……。\n 先刻 ここを逃げだした あの獣のようにな。:
Yes...just like that beast you saw that
escaped from here.

17162.「この部屋は あの おぞましい獣を\n 閉じ込めておくために 封じていたのだ。\:
This room was sealed to keep that horrible
beast contained. Don't you realize what
you've done?

17163.「私は あの獣を 捕らえなくてはならぬ。\n そなたらも 立ち去りなさい。:
I must catch that beast before it gets too
far. Begone from this place, all of you.

17164.「あの獣は 不老の禁術の 犠牲者ということか。\n ……ならば ヤツの身体を調べ:
So that beast is a victim of the forbidden
art... Then I must examine its body and
reveal its power myself.

17165.「オイラが 桜の間で見た 女の幽霊って……\n ヒメア様だったんだな。:
The ghost I saw in the Chamber of Cherry
Blossoms... It must've been Lady Himea!

17166.「うへへ…… オイラさ～\n ヒメア様に 会ったことなかったから\n カンちがい:
Eh heh... I've never met her before now,
so I guess I was just seein' things.

17167.「あ～ ゴホン！！ というわけで\n ついに 秘められた謎の部屋 神代の間の姿が:
Ah! (ahem) Finally, the secret mystery of the
Hall of Old has been revealed to us!

17168.「みごと任務を完遂した 諸君らには \n 記念品を 贈呈しよう！ 受け取れい！:
For those of you who were successful in your
mission, you will receive this commemoration!
Take it!

17169.「これにて 若葉の探検隊は 解散だ！\n さあ 帰ろう！ すぐ 帰ろう！:
With that, the Squadron of Young Leaves is
dismissed! Time to go home!

17171.「まさか あたしたちの 探検が\n こんな結果を 招いてしまうなんて……。:
I never imagined that our exploration would
lead to something so horrible...

17172.「でも こんな状況だというのに\n あたしには ひとつ どうしても\n 気がかり:
But aside from that, there was just one
thing I couldn't help but wonder about.

17173.「なぜ ハジカ先生は\n コノタが拾った ラブレターなんて\n ほしがったんでし:
Why would Professor Hajika want that love
letter Konota found?

17174.「そのことが どうしても気になって\n あたしは ひとりになってから\n ラブレ:
I just couldn't stop thinking about it. So,
when I was alone, I opened the love letter...
and that's when I realized...

17175.「あたし……どうして 今まで \n このことに 気づかなかったんだろう……。: Why... Why didn't I realize it until now...?

39111.「この部屋の どこかに 神代の間へ続く\n 地下迷宮の入り口が あるはずです！\:
Somewhere in this room should be the entrance
to the underground maze. Let's split up and
search for it!

60614.棚の下から 地下へ続く はしごが現れた！:
A ladder leading underground appears under
the shelf!

60616.「今…… なにか 聞こえませんでしたか？: Did...did any of you hear something just now?

60617.「ゆ ゆ 幽霊だ……！！\n 女の幽霊の声だよ あんちゃん！\n なあ 帰ろう！:
It's-it's the ghost!! That's the voice of the
ghost woman, bro! Come on, we should
get outta here! I knew this was a bad idea!

60618.「ビビってんなよ 風の音だろ？\n 諸君！ これより 我々 若葉の探検隊は\n:
What are you scared for? It's just the wind. Alright! The Squadron of Young Leaves will now make their way underground, and head
towards the Hall of Old!

60619.「この先 いかなる危険が あるともわからん。 \n しかし数々の苦難を 乗り越え:
We know not what dangers lie ahead. But we've
overcome many hardships to get this far! I
know that we will all come back here alive!

60620.「……それで 生きて帰ってこれなかったら\n どうするつもりだい？:
...And just what will you do if you DON'T
make it back here alive?

60622.「なにやら さわがしいから 来てみれば……\n 本当に 神代の間への道を 見つけ:
I came to see what the ruckus was...
I never thought you'd actually find the way
to the Hall of Old.

60623.「行動力があるのは いいことだが \n 私が 師である以上 学徒の君たちに\n:
I'm glad to see you all have initiative.
However, as your teacher, I cannot allow my
students to put themselves into danger.

60624.「<pc>さん……と いいましたか。\n もちろん あなたもですよ。\n 探検ご:
And <pc>, was it? I'm talking to you
as well. Will you give up this little game of
explorers and just go home?<yesno><close>

60626.「オレは イヤだね。危険が なんだ！\n 先生だって 言ってたじゃないか！\n:
No way I'm backin' down. Even if it is
dangerous! You even said it yourself, teach!
"Curiosity is the heart of learning"!

60628.「オレも イヤだね。危険が なんだ！\n 先生だって 言ってたじゃないか！\n:
No way I'm backin' down, either. Even if it is
dangerous! You even said it yourself, teach!
"Curiosity is the heart of learning"!

60629.「あたしも この先に なにがあるのか\n 自分の目で 確かめたいんです。\n 行:
I also want to see what's head for myself.
Please...you have to let us go.

60631.「わかった。では こうしよう。\n 私も引率として 君たちに ついていく。:
All right. Then we'll do it this wayー
I'll accompany you all to supervise.

60632.「すこしでも 危険があったら引き返すこと。\n そして 絶対に はぐれないこと。:
If there's even the smallest hint of dangerー
we turn back. And you must stay near me at
all times. Can you promise me that?

60633.「さっすが ハジカ先生！\n 話の わかる男だぜ！:
I knew I could count on you, teach!
You totally get it!

60634.「それでは新たなメンバー 隊員４号を加えて\n 地下探検に 出発だ！！:
Welcome to the team, Leaf No. 4!
Alright! We're heading underground!

60635.「えへ。ど どうしよう。\n ハジカ先生が 一緒だなんて……。:
Ehe... W...what to do?
I can't believe Professor Hajika is coming
with us...
